## Day 3 coding practice

```{r}
vec_a <- c(1, 6)

vec_b <- c(2, 4)

```

## check by hand solutions

```{r}
# addition
vec_a + vec_b
```

```{r}
# subtraction
vec_b - vec_a
```

```{r}
# scalar multiplication
4 * vec_a
```

```{r}
# dot product
vec_a %*% vec_b
```
